QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Uldum!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Adarrah at Thistleshrub Valley in Tanaris.$B$BBe one of the first to enter glorious Uldum and claim its treasures in honor of the Alliance!$B$BYou can reach Adarrah's caravan by traveling to the western reaches of Tanaris.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Adarrah at Thistleshrub Valley in Tanaris.
QuestData.RewardText: There are wonders just waiting to be discovered beyond this valley. And they will be ours!
